Class Courses

  • java.lang.Object
    • Courses
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataManagerInterface, java.io.Serializable, Tableizeable<DataManagerInterface>

    public class Courses
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataManagerInterface
    Assignment 5, Spring 2015: ServiceOrdersManager (Data Manager) Implements CourseManagerInterface interface and its methods.As the data manager, computations and methods for Driver class are created. Contains reference objects in binary tree.
    Author:
    Ebony Cross
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
